pullrequest.title: Fixed a typo in logging failures in the queue.

content.raw:
I'm not 100% sure on what was clicked when, but two of my tabs had crashed, one due to a h5 file access problem. I believe that the first (an rfblaster) crashed, pausing the queue and causing the abort bug, then the second (NI6363) crashed with the file access problem, possibly as a result?
I then restarted both tabs. The NI6363 tab was never redrawn and BLACS became unresponsive. I may have tried to unpause the queue immediately after restarting the tabs, but I can't remember? The log file shows the NI6363's tab being set up with unit calibrations, but then just ends
content.html: I'm not 100% sure on what was clicked when, but two of my tabs had crashed, one due to a h5 file access problem. I believe that the first (an rfblaster) crashed, pausing the queue and causing the abort bug, then the second (NI6363) crashed with the file access problem, possibly as a result? I then restarted both tabs. The NI6363 tab was never redrawn and BLACS became unresponsive. I may have tried to unpause the queue immediately after restarting the tabs, but I can't remember? The log file shows the NI6363's tab being set up with unit calibrations, but then just ends
